name: YES AND! (Full Game)
description:
YES AND! is a visual novel with a typing mechanic that allows the player to experience and explore the difficulties of saying no. Help Ellie stand up for herself and learn the importance of prioritizing her own needs.

*Trigger Warning: depictions of bullying, and covert narcissism.

This is the intended completed game for the May Day Mental Health Jam made by Sarah and Laura! View the jam submission here.

*Note: If the animations look laggy, turning on Hardware Acceleration in your browser settings usually helps.

---
